ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters (OFF TOPIC)
ygData.msgSnippet: Of course enchanter illusions should not be shared. I totally agree that it would make the game faction useless in many aspects. About the druid spell share
ygData.messageBody:
Of course enchanter illusions should not be shared. I totally agree that it
would make the game faction useless in many aspects. About the druid spell
share wolfform it only makes you non KoS to undead, as in Unrest or
Mistmoore. And if you stay in Mistmoore to long, you will still get your
faction down so much that you are KoS even in wolfform (dunno about Unrest,
never liked that place much :P), while if enchanter illusions would make you
non KoS in just about any zone in game, ending with shared illusion:skeleton
(non KoS in Hate). Illusion Werewolf might also be a lil too much as it has
a "SoW" effect to it that also works indoors. One would say that its not
fair to other classes that enc can do all this but well, enc can do just
about nothing solo, so if they are indifferent or fast it dont do them much
good in a dungeon anyhow as their teammates are not. And even if i am wrong
about them not beeing able to solo (after lvl 30 or so) the enc class is a
GROUP class like no other (well maybe clerics :P) and they just plain
shouldnt be soloing anyhow :)

And someone PLEASE find diamond dust soon, i need to get my skill up bu
something cheaper than aqualungs :)

-Sandortien, 50th season wiz of Xegony
